committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water, Power and Offshore Energy Resources

official_title: To disallow the Secretary of the Interior from issuing oil and gas leases with respect to certain geographical areas located in the Pacific Ocean off the coastline of the State of California.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of the Interior from issuing any new oil or gas lease on any submerged lands of the Outer Continental Shelf located within a specified geographical area off the coast of California and located within specified portions of: (1) the Channel Islands National Marine Sanctuary; and (2) the Channel Islands Area.

titles.title: To disallow the Secretary of the Interior from issuing oil and gas leases with respect to certain geographical areas located in the Pacific Ocean off the coastline of the State of California.
